casebody.data:
BENNETT
v.
BENNETT. No. 37A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 30, 2007. Angela L. Little, Greensboro, for Lee Ann P. Bennett. Stephen E. Robertson, Greensboro, Michael R. Bennett, King, for Gregory Bennett. Gary S. Parsons, Hannah G. Styron, Raleigh, for NCADA. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for NCATL. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 638 S.E.2d 243 . The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of March 2007 by Defendant to Withdraw Appeal: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
